fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Change a letter in a player’s role name. Any abilities that would reveal that player’s role will show the changed name

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -If a player’s role has a typo or differentiation from the original post anywhere in their role’s bot command, deal a powerful attack to your target

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: have at least 1/3rd of the alive players at the end of the game have a typo in their role and eliminate any players with a typo in their role
